title: Banner should give more MR not armor
body: You mostly want banner vs AP heavy comps since they do less damage to the empowered minion. This should also mean your stats for the item should have more MR imo.

replies.body:
With its current build path it's not possible but I agree. But only because the thing isn't like a piece of armor. It's a banner a magical banner.

The magic immunity should be nerfed imo in preparation of how crazy baron cannons are gonna become. It's also straight bull vs. an ap splitpusher. Too bull.

also technically just got a SMALL buff against ap splitpushers as 5 bonus damage was removed from every auto attack in game vs minons.

AP Splitpushers? Like who? Teemo? The guy who builds a lot of on-hit damage now? Akali? The assassin with her primary waveclear on a physical damage ability?

Besides, if they have Baron, the *last* thing you should be doing is trying to splitpush. You're almost certain to get killed 1v1, and (even now!) they only need to show up nearby a minion wave to fuck your entire plan up. You shouldn't be overextending, you should be playing safer than normal.
I actually like to rush it first, you would be surprised how much ad damage mages deal early when they attack poke you. I very much like it as is.
Or...we could change the shield to block physical damage.  Just a suggestion.
Or we can delete that dumb item and stop abuse of siege baron empowered minion with banner used on it.
